overview: Anwar Sukhoi, a Thailand drug lord, wants to expand his business empire in South East Asia. So he creates a false competition amonst drug traffickers in the region. An undercover team is formed by Bunga. This task force is comprises police and ex-criminals, each with their own special skills. They manage to thwart Anwar Sukhoiâ€™s plan.
title: Gerbang 13
